summary: Miracles Out of Nowhere tells the improbable story of the band KANSAS and the miraculous ride from their gutted school bus, to signing with music mogul Don Kirshner, to touring with QUEEN, ... See full summary Â»
cast: Phil Ehart|Richard Williams|Robby Steinhardt|Steve Walsh|Kerry Livgren|Dave Hope|David Wild|Ron Alexenburg|Budd Carr|Jeff Glixman|Garth Brooks|Brian May|Brendan O'Brien|Don Kirshner|Rich Engel
title: Miracles Out of Nowhere
